short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is used for Encoding / Decoding URLs and URL parameters

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
URL Formatter is an offline URL Encoder/ Decoder.

It is a simple utility and is meant for aiding in quickly encode / decode the URLs and URL parameters.
